---
title: Networks and RPC endpoints
---

import AddMetamaskNetwork from "../../src/components/AddMetamaskNetwork";

This reference guide provides a listing of the different Arthera networks and public RPC endpoints.

## Arthera Mainnet

Please note there will be **no AA token in circulation until Spring 2024**. Apps who need to deploy to Arthera Mainnet must [request a deployer subscription](https://t.me/artherachain).

- **RPC Endpoint: `https://rpc.arthera.net`**
- **WebSocket Endpoint: `wss://ws.arthera.net`**
- **Chain ID: `10242`**
- **Explorer: https://explorer.arthera.net**
- **Wallet: https://wallet.arthera.net **
- **API Gateway**:
  - https://apigw.arthera.net

<AddMetamaskNetwork
  network={"mainnet"}
  title={"Add Arthera Mainnet to MetaMask"}
  size={"small"}
/>

## Arthera Testnet

- **RPC Endpoint: `https://rpc-test2.arthera.net`**
- **WebSocket Endpoint: `wss://ws-test2.arthera.net`**
- **Chain ID: `10243`**
- **Explorers: https://explorer-test2.arthera.net and https://arthera-testnet.socialscan.io**
- **Wallet: https://wallet-test.arthera.net **
- **API Gateway**:
  - https://apigw-test2.arthera.net

<AddMetamaskNetwork
  network={"testnet"}
  title={"Add Arthera Testnet to MetaMask"}
  size={"small"}
/>

You can get some Testnet AA tokens using our [faucet](https://faucet.arthera.net).

---

:::info

_Latest update: [January 8, 2024](https://github.com/artheranet/arthera-docs)_

:::
